entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 12 February 2023
